Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Nguye Owanidalayo ngothuli, emva koko ngeqabaza lembewu yomntu, emva koko ngehlwili elinamathelayo; emva koko Unikhuphela ngaphandle ningabantwana, Aphinde Aniphucule nifikelele ebuntwini, Niphinde nibe ngamaxhego. Ukanti phakathi kwenu kukho abo bathatyathwa bafe phambi (koko) khona ukuze nifikelele kwithuba elithile; mhlawumbi niya kuyisebenzisa ingqiqo
NguYe Onika ubomi Enze ukufa; Xa Emisela into Usuka Athi kuyo: “Yibakho”, ibekho
Akubaboni na ukuba baphambuke njani na abo baphikisana nemiqondiso ka-Allâh
Abo bayiphikayo iNcwadi (i’Kur’ân) noko Sakuthumela abaThunywa beThu baza kwazi
Xa amakhamandela ebathandele ezintanyeni zabo namakhonkco; baya kurhuqwa
Emanzini abilayo; naseMlilweni baya kuhlohlwa (amadangatya oMlilo eziswini zabo)
Kuze kuthiwe kubo: “Baphi na abo nanidla ngokubayamanisa njengamahlulelane (kuAllâh)
bengengo-Allâh?’’ Baya kuthi bona: “Basishiyile: gxebe, asizanga sinqule nto thina ngaphambili,” Ubalahlekisa ngolo hlobo ke uAllâh abangakholwayo
(Iingelosi ziya kuthi): “Oko kwaba ngenxa yokuba nina nanizikhukhumalisa emhlabeni ngokungekho lungelweni yaye naniziphethe ngolunya

Ngoko ke wena (Muhammad) yiba nomonde; inene isithembiso sika-Allâh siyinyaniso. Enokuba Singakubonisa inxalenye yoko Sibathembise kona okanye Sikuthabathe wena ngokufa, kukuThi apho baza kubuyiselwa khona
